title: Vast Challenge 2022- MC 3 - Economic Issues and Financial Health
description:
Constructed a web app for interactive data visualizations using D3.js, featuring 6 distinct chart types enhanced with animations and interactive functionalities. 
Established RESTful APIs in Flask for efficient frontend-backend communication while simultaneously performing data preprocessing using Python and pandas.

title: Smart Museum Tours
description: Created an application leveraging Linked Open Data (LOD) to deliver artifact details within museums via QR code scans, utilizing React.js and SPARQL. Implemented a Spring Boot application with REST APIs and integrated that with AWS-hosted Fuseki servers via the Apache Jena framework.

title: Github Ideal Behaviors
description: Crafted a Python-based system using FastAPI framework to automatically categorize developers by their Git contributions, resulting in over 60% reduction in managerial investigation time. Employed a robust MVC architecture with Pydantic models to optimize data handling and system structure, achieving a code coverage of 96% through Pytest unit testing.

title: Automatic defect Inspector based on CNN and Computer Vision
description: Developed an CNN model for automated inspection system utilizing TensorFlow, OpenCV, achieving a 16% efficiency improvement and comparing the accuracy of YOLO v3 (mAP 71.65%) and Faster R-CNN (mAP 42.69%) algorithms.
